span.p: Packets for children who will be going to Kindergarten in the fall will be available at both elementary buildings on Monday April 20. Please complete the paperwork in the packet and drop it off either on Friday April 24 from 9:00 to 2:00 or Friday May 1 from 9:00 to 2:00 at either elementary building. Someone will be there to take your packet. Thank you for helping us get ready for our incoming Kindergarteners.
Please click on the link to fill out the contact information form.
